query: SELECT s.id as scooterId, s.name, s.totalDistance, s.totalRides, s.userId, r.id as rideId, r.distance, r.duration, r.date FROM scooters s LEFT JOIN ridingRecords r ON r.scooterId = s.id AND r.userId = s.userId WHERE s.name LIKE '%하코%' ORDER BY r.id DESC;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute SELECT s.id as scooterId, s.name, s.totalDistance, s.totalRides, s.userId, r.id as rideId, r.distance, r.duration, r.date FROM scooters s LEFT JOIN ridingRecords r ON r.scooterId = s.id AND r.userId = s.userId WHERE s.name LIKE '%하코%' ORDER BY r.id DESC;
